name: Anderson Chaves
tagline: Telecommunications Engineer, Data Scientist, and Software Developer.
body:
### About Me
I hold a degree in Telecommunications Engineering by the Federal Institute of Ceará located in Brazil. I've been a researcher in the Laboratory of Digital Signal Processing of Federal Institute of Ceará for two years and I've worked in projects related with image processing with OpenCV library and chaotic criptography projects with cellular automata which led to some [publication](http://www.infobrasil.inf.br/userfiles/OK-Criptografia-122414.pdf). My greatest interests currently are in big data and artificial intelligence fields such as data mining, machine learning and intelligent systems in general. I'm currently an entrepreneur working on personal projects related within machine learning. I am also available for freelance web and mobile development.

### Contact
Contact me via my Github (@apachaves) or other places like my [Linkedin](https://br.linkedin.com/in/apachaves) or my [Twitter](https://twitter.com/apachaves).
